page.title: 08HOUSING ASHBY M, PEATLING P.
page.content:
There are 85 houses and bungalows including 7 farmhouses and 2 thatched cottages; and one public house. These are predominently of red brick and mostly owner occupied. Approximately 2O are post-war developments and the remainder were built in the l8th,l9th and early 2Oth century.
The recent demolition of Gamble Farm is to be replaced by 3 houses fronting Peveril Road and 3 bungalows on Old Forge Road and represents the biggest single development in the history of Ashby Magna.
Housing in Peatling Parva - approximately 5O dwellings the majority of which are owner occupied.
